## MapView class

初始化地图

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class MapView extends ToolBase<MapOption, MapViewEventType>
```

**Extends:** ToolBase&lt;[MapOption](./cesium.mapoption)<!-- -->, MapViewEventType&gt;

## Example

```ts
const map = new MapView(DIVID, {
  id: MAPID
})

map.enable()
map.eventBus.once('ready', e => {
  console.log(e.view?.id)
})
```
